p: Organic chemicals (methanol, dimethyl sulfoxide) of analytical and chromatography grade and the AG (yeast maltase) enzyme were obtained from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany) and Megazyme (Megazyme, Bray, Ireland), respectively. Quercetin as the standard and ρ-nitrophenyl- ρ-D-glucopyranosidase (PNPG) as the substrate were procured from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA).
